comments.body: This will not work when we support `httpapi`.  NXAPI does not support `| json`.  We should add a TBD to fix this when support is added.

`| json` won't work for the devices that do not have structured output support. We still have to support those devices as they are not End of Support yet according to Cisco https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/nexus-7000-series-switches/eos-eol-notice-c51-742131.html
We want to make sure that new resource modules work on every device.

@trishnaguha Hi Trishna. Mike and I are pushing back on this request. This module was very broken except for rudimentary test cases. It now works on _all_ of our regression testbeds and images, with a more comprehensive (and complex) set of test cases, with the exception of the 6.2 image you referenced. We would like to see this PR merged since it fixes so many issues, and open a new issue to address the legacy/EOL limitation separately. I added a TBD to the facts code with a suggested resolution for that. Thanks.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +64,68 @@            # Use structured for most of the vlan parameter states.
            # This data is consistent across the supported nxos platforms.
            structured = self.get_device_data(connection, 'show vlan | json')

            # Raw cli config is needed for mapped_vni, which is not included in structured.
